protectionsUnavailableNote.title: Privacy Protections are not available for special pages or local pages.
protectionsUnavailableNote.note: 'Special pages' here means things like the browser settings page, whereas 'local pages' means files opened from the user's computer rather than the internet

spreadText.title: Help us spread the word to your family and friends

emailText.title: Sign up for DuckDuckGo Email Protection for your extension now!
emailText.note: Extension here means browser extension or addon
